DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine compare electroencephalography ( EEG ) change human subject directly inhalation essential oil five Thai aromatherapy . The investigator hypothesize essential oil Thai aromatherapy may influence human EEG involve emotional relaxation particularly alpha wave EEG .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Essential Oils Aromatherapy Emotional Relaxation
DOC.detailed_description: The subject consist 22 male 26 female subject , age 20 30 year ( mean age , 23.3 year ) . They screen excessive nasal congestion , drug food take , neurological disorder prior participation experiment . The experiment approve Ethical Committee Research Involving Human Research Subject , Naresuan University . All subject read sign informed consent participation .
DOC.criteria: > 18 year old excessive nasal congestion neurological disorder prior participation experiment
